item.title: Tame Multiple Obsidian Vaults With This Plugin Sync Hack
item.author: Jonas Avrin
item.description: If you’re like me and you’ve tried to maintain multiple Obsidian vaults, odds are you’ve encountered the same headache of having to sync plugins and settings which usually takes you out of the flow. You also might be thinking to yourself, why haven’t I done something about this yet, I mean, I love hacking in the terminal don’t I? I separate vaults based on a variety of reasons, but a common reason would be to separate your public and private notes.
